channel.title: Patterns on Fluid
channel.description: Recent content in Patterns on Fluid

item.description: Storybook Tutorial npx create-react-app float-app cd float-app npx -p @storybook/cli sb init In the root folder of the project add a new file called .env with the following: SKIP_PREFLIGHT_CHECK=true check that the various environments of our application are working properly: # Run the test runner (Jest) in a terminal: yarn test --watchAll # Start the component explorer on port 6006: yarn storybook # Run the frontend app proper on port 3000: yarn start Edit style in LESS files.
